original_text: But another servant might say to himself, “My master is very late. He will not come yet.” Then he begins to hit the other servants, both the men and the women. He eats too much, and he drinks too much. He even becomes drunk.
korean_text: 만일 그 종이 마음에 생각하기를 주인이 더디 오리라 하여 남녀 종들을 때리며 먹고 마시고 취하게 되면

sentences.original_text: But another servant might say to himself
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 다른 종은 스스로에게 말할지도 모릅니다

sentences.original_text: Then he begins to hit the other servants
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 다른 종들을 때리기 시작합니다

sentences.original_text: both the men and the women
